**Minimum VPX Standalone build:** 10.8.0-5b941e6

---

## Instructions

- This table will not launch as downloaded, and requires application of the .dif file to the .vpx. If you are not comfortable with that process, please wait for the Wizard version. 
- Install this table through the Table Manager, using the `Add Table` > `Manual` page
- DO NOT install any .ini file included in the table download, use the one provided here.
- If you need help, more information can be found on the wiki: [TM - Add Table - Manual](https://github.com/LegendsUnchained/vpx-standalone-alp4k/wiki/%5B04%5D-%F0%9F%A7%A1-TM-%E2%80%90-Other-Features#add-table---manual)
- If the table requires any additional files/steps, click `GO TO TABLE` after adding, and the TM will open to the relevant table folder.

"Open Sesame!"
